verses.verse: ט֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Better פַּ֣ת <S%H6595><s%> morsel חֲ֭רֵבָה <S%H2720><s%> [is] a dry וְשַׁלְוָה־ <S%H7962><s%> and quietness בָ֑הּ מִ֝בַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> therewith than an house מָלֵ֥א <S%H4392><s%> full זִבְחֵי־ <S%H2077><s%> of sacrifices רִֽיב׃ <S%H7379><s%> [with] strife

עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> servant מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H7919><s%> A wise יִ֭מְשֹׁל <S%H4910><s%> shall have rule בְּבֵ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> over a son מֵבִ֑ישׁ <S%H954><s%> that causeth shame וּבְת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among אַ֝חִ֗ים <S%H251><s%> the brethren יַחֲלֹ֥ק <S%H2505><s%> and shall have part נַחֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5159><s%> of the inheritance

מַצְרֵ֣ף <S%H4715><s%> The fining pot לַ֭כֶּסֶף <S%H3701><s%> [is] for silver וְכ֣וּר <S%H3564><s%> and the furnace לַזָּהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> for gold וּבֹחֵ֖ן <S%H974><s%> trieth לִבּ֣וֹת <S%H3826><s%> the hearts יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD

מֵ֭רַע <S%H7489><s%> A wicked doer מַקְשִׁ֣יב <S%H7181><s%> giveth heed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> lips אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> to false שֶׁ֥קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [and] a liar מֵ֝זִין <S%H238><s%> giveth ear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לְשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue הַוֹּֽת׃ <S%H1942><s%> to a naughty

לֹעֵ֣ג <S%H3932><s%> Whoso mocketh לָ֭רָשׁ <S%H7326><s%> the poor חֵרֵ֣ף <S%H2778><s%> reproacheth עֹשֵׂ֑הוּ <S%H6213><s%> his Maker שָׂמֵ֥חַ <S%H8056><s%> [and] he that is glad לְ֝אֵ֗יד <S%H343><s%> at calamities לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִנָּקֶֽה׃ <S%H5352><s%> shall not be unpunished

עֲטֶ֣רֶת <S%H5850><s%> [are] the crown זְ֭קֵנִים <S%H2205><s%> of old men בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Children's בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> children וְתִפְאֶ֖רֶת <S%H8597><s%> and the glory בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> of children אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> [are] their fathers

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not נָאוָ֣ה <S%H5000><s%> becometh לְנָבָ֣ל <S%H5036><s%> not a fool שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> speech יֶ֑תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Excellent אַ֝֗ף <S%H637><s%> less כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְנָדִ֥יב <S%H5081><s%> a prince שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> lips שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> much less do lying

אֶֽבֶן־ <S%H68><s%> stone חֵ֣ן <S%H2580><s%> [is as] a precious הַ֭שֹּׁחַד <S%H7810><s%> A gift בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes בְעָלָ֑יו <S%H1167><s%> of him that hath אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he יִפְנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> it whithersoever it turneth יַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <S%H7919><s%> it prospereth

מְֽכַסֶּה־ <S%H3680><s%> He that covereth פֶּ֭שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> a transgression מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> seeketh אַהֲבָ֑ה <S%H160><s%> love וְשֹׁנֶ֥ה <S%H8138><s%> but he that repeateth בְ֝דָבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> a matter מַפְרִ֥יד <S%H6504><s%> separateth אַלּֽוּף׃ <S%H441><s%> [very] friends

תֵּ֣חַת <S%H5181><s%> entereth גְּעָרָ֣ה <S%H1606><s%> A reproof בְמֵבִ֑ין <S%H995><s%> more into a wise man מֵהַכּ֖וֹת <S%H5221><s%> stripes כְּסִ֣יל <S%H3684><s%> into a fool מֵאָֽה׃ <S%H3967><s%> than an hundred

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> only מְרִ֥י <S%H4805><s%> only rebellion יְבַקֶּשׁ־ <S%H1245><s%> [man] seeketh רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> An evil וּמַלְאָ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> messenger אַ֝כְזָרִ֗י <S%H394><s%> therefore a cruel יְשֻׁלַּח־ <S%H7971><s%> shall be sent בּֽוֹ׃

פָּג֬וֹשׁ <S%H6298><s%> of her whelps meet דֹּ֣ב <S%H1677><s%> Let a bear שַׁכּ֣וּל <S%H7909><s%> robbed בְּאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> rather than כְּ֝סִ֗יל <S%H3684><s%> a fool בְּאִוַּלְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H200><s%> in his folly

מֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> Whoso rewardeth רָ֭עָה <S%H7451><s%> evil תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash טוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> for good לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not [תָמִישׁ כ] (תָמ֥וּשׁ <S%H4185><s%> cease ק) רָ֝עָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> evil מִבֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> from his house

פּ֣וֹטֵֽר <S%H6362><s%> [is as] when one letteth out מַ֭יִם <S%H4325><s%> water רֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> The beginning מָד֑וֹן <S%H4066><s%> of strife וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הִ֝תְגַּלַּ֗ע <S%H1566><s%> it be meddled הָרִ֥יב <S%H7379><s%> contention נְטֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H5203><s%> therefore leave off

מַצְדִּ֣יק <S%H6663><s%> He that justifieth רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked וּמַרְשִׁ֣יעַ <S%H7561><s%> and he that condemneth צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> the just תּוֹעֲבַ֥ת <S%H8441><s%> [are] abomination יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> alike שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> even they both

לָמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long זֶּ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> is there מְחִ֣יר <S%H4242><s%> Wherefore [is there] a price בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> in the hand כְּסִ֑יל <S%H3684><s%> of a fool לִקְנ֖וֹת <S%H7069><s%> to get חָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וְלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> seeing [he hath] no heart אָֽיִן׃ <S%H369><s%> has

בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵ֭ת <S%H6256><s%> at all times אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> loveth הָרֵ֑עַ <S%H7453><s%> A friend וְאָ֥ח <S%H251><s%> and a brother לְ֝צָרָ֗ה <S%H6869><s%> for adversity יִוָּלֵֽד׃ <S%H3205><s%> is born

אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> A man חֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> void לֵ֭ב <S%H3820><s%> of understanding תּוֹקֵ֣עַ <S%H8628><s%> striketh כָּ֑ף <S%H3709><s%> hands עֹרֵ֥ב <S%H6148><s%> [and] becometh עֲ֝רֻבָּ֗ה <S%H6161><s%> surety לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> in the presence רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> of his friend

אֹ֣הֵֽב <S%H157><s%> He loveth פֶּ֭שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> transgression אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> that loveth מַצָּ֑ה <S%H4683><s%> strife מַגְבִּ֥יהַּ <S%H1361><s%> [and] he that exalteth פִּ֝תְח֗וֹ <S%H6607><s%> his gate מְבַקֶּשׁ־ <S%H1245><s%> seeketh שָֽׁבֶר׃ <S%H7667><s%> destruction

עִקֶּשׁ־ <S%H6141><s%> He that hath a froward לֵ֭ב <S%H3820><s%> heart לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יִמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> findeth ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> no good וְנֶהְפָּ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> and he that hath a perverse בִּ֝לְשׁוֹנ֗וֹ <S%H3956><s%> tongue יִפּ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> falleth בְּרָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> into mischief

יֹלֵ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> He that begetteth כְּ֭סִיל <S%H3684><s%> a fool לְת֣וּגָה <S%H8424><s%> [doeth it] to his sorrow ל֑וֹ וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִ֝שְׂמַ֗ח <S%H8055><s%> hath no joy אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> and the father נָבָֽל׃ <S%H5036><s%> of a fool

לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart שָׂ֭מֵחַ <S%H8056><s%> A merry יֵיטִ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> doeth good גֵּהָ֑ה <S%H1456><s%> [like] a medicine וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit נְ֝כֵאָ֗ה <S%H5218><s%> but a broken תְּיַבֶּשׁ־ <S%H3001><s%> drieth גָּֽרֶם׃ <S%H1634><s%> the bones

שֹׁ֣חַד <S%H7810><s%> a gift מֵ֭חֵיק <S%H2436><s%> out of the bosom רָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> A wicked יִקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> [man] taketh לְ֝הַטּ֗וֹת <S%H5186><s%> to pervert אָרְח֥וֹת <S%H734><s%> the ways מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> of judgment

אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> is in פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the presence מֵבִ֣ין <S%H995><s%> has חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> Wisdom וְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> but the eyes כְ֝סִ֗יל <S%H3684><s%> of a fool בִּקְצֵה־ <S%H7097><s%> [are] in the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

כַּ֣עַס <S%H3708><s%> [is] a grief לְ֭אָבִיו <S%H1><s%> to his father בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> son כְּסִ֑יל <S%H3684><s%> A foolish וּ֝מֶ֗מֶר <S%H4470><s%> and bitterness לְיוֹלַדְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3205><s%> to her that bare

גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> is also עֲנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H6064><s%> Also to punish לַצַּדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> the just לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] not good לְהַכּ֖וֹת <S%H5221><s%> [nor] to strike נְדִיבִ֣ים <S%H5081><s%> princes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יֹֽשֶׁר׃ <S%H3476><s%> for equity

חוֹשֵׂ֣ךְ <S%H2820><s%> spareth אֲ֭מָרָיו <S%H561><s%> his words יוֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> He that hath דָּ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge [וְקַר־ כ] (יְקַר־ <S%H7119><s%> who ק) <S%H7119><s%> who אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [and] a man תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <S%H8394><s%> of understanding

גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> Even אֱוִ֣יל <S%H191><s%> Even a fool מַ֭חֲרִישׁ <S%H2790><s%> when he holdeth his peace חָכָ֣ם <S%H2450><s%> wise יֵחָשֵׁ֑ב <S%H2803><s%> is counted אֹטֵ֖ם <S%H331><s%> [and] he that shutteth שְׂפָתָ֣יו <S%H8193><s%> his lips נָבֽוֹן׃ <S%H995><s%> [is esteemed] a man of understanding
